pullRequest.title: Add syntax support for CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW
pullRequest.bodyText:
Make Presto parser support CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW syntax, ex.
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS mv
COMMENT 'A simple materialized view'
WITH (
partitioned_by = ARRAY['ds'],
retention_days = 90
)
AS SELECT * FROM t
We do not support REPLACE MATERIALIZED VIEW at the moment,
since that is possible to trigger the entire view refresh.
Users could use DROP and CREATE a new materialzied view instead.
This commit rewrites a subset of
trinodb/trino@88116a4
due to above reason.
Test plan -

Add unit tests to TestSqlParser
mvn test

== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

nodes.bodyText: What I'm hesitating on is CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW statement is actually not in SQL standard. However, Oracle, MS, postgres, snowflake, sybase, BigQuery, etc all use this syntax. So likely it will be in standard some day in the future. cc: @rongrong
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -61,6 +61,9 @@ statement
     | CREATE (OR REPLACE)? VIEW qualifiedName
             (SECURITY (DEFINER | INVOKER))? AS query                       #createView
     | DROP VIEW (IF EXISTS)? qualifiedName                             #dropView
+    | CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW (IF NOT EXISTS)? qualifiedName

nodes.bodyText: Could you help to fix #createMaterializedView's indentation by moving it forward 1 space?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -61,6 +61,9 @@ statement
     | CREATE (OR REPLACE)? VIEW qualifiedName
             (SECURITY (DEFINER | INVOKER))? AS query                       #createView
     | DROP VIEW (IF EXISTS)? qualifiedName                             #dropView
+    | CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW (IF NOT EXISTS)? qualifiedName
+        (COMMENT string)?
+        (WITH properties)? AS (query | '('query')')                     #createMaterializedView

nodes.bodyText: remove this as we don't use it
I would move this to a static helper in the test
Use ImmutableList.of() instead of new ArrayList<>(); same for other places

beforeCommit.message:
Add syntax support for CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW

Make Presto parser support CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW syntax, ex.

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS mv
COMMENT 'A simple materialized view'
WITH (
	partitioned_by = ARRAY['ds'],
	retention_days = 90
)
AS SELECT * FROM t

We do not support REPLACE MATERIALIZED VIEW at the moment,
since that is possible to trigger the entire view refresh.
Users could use DROP and CREATE a new materialzied view instead.

This commit rewrites a subset of
https://github.com/prestosql/presto/commit/88116a4a3fda92f0caa725d9b1a83e9b22f7dcf4
due to above reason.

Co-Authored-By: Anjali Norwood <52180099+anjalinorwood@users.noreply.github.com>
